body:
Well, what can i say

It was AMAZING.

Today was the very first time i ever played nexus, and it was great, i dont have to worry about bridging anymore, or monument breaks, its just PvP for 10 straight minutes. I played it so much today infact, that i got over 1,500 kills in 24 hours.

And as for everything else, such as the new nebula maps, and avicade...
They're amazing, it brings a breath of fresh air when i play nebula and Avicade is for when i need to relax a bit.


All i have left to say is, Im excited for the future of avicus at this point.

title: Day 1 of Avicore

replies.body: I'm a glad you had a great day, if only I can be as good as a pvper than you >:D
replies.body_tagged: I'm a glad you had a great day, if only I can be as good as a pvper than you >:D

replies.body: Dats deep. For the 15 minutes that I have been on, it has been a blast! I played one game of elim (Which is fantastic btw). And I played some nexus.
replies.body_tagged: Dats deep. For the 15 minutes that I have been on, it has been a blast! I played one game of elim (Which is fantastic btw). And I played some nexus.

replies.body: Ive was at my trailer i couldent play and its my bed time ill stay up for a bit but im sad i never go to play

replies.body:
I played my two maps.
On wasteland someone said 'this map sux' so I sad 'ty'. He said 'np', and he didn't know I made it. So a minute after that the msg came in chat; "Currently playing wasteland by steven5703" and he was like, "soz"

replies.body: I agree! Nexus was really fun, and soon there may be new players to play with :). I also found some MCZone players come back already!
replies.body_tagged: I agree! Nexus was really fun, and soon there may be new players to play with :). I also found some MCZone players come back already!

replies.body: I loved the first day too
replies.body_tagged: I loved the first day too

replies.body:
pros
Nexus was awesome and seeing a lot of old members and staff was great. Everybody came and enjoyed playing avicus today.
cons
They got rid of Luar
There were a lot of flyhackers.
